mhrNumberSearch.mhrHintMessage: Manufactured home registration numbers normally contain up to 6 digits
mhrNumberSearch.searchResultsInfo: Select the manufactured home to download the full details of the home. Selecting the home will debit your search fee from your BC Online account. The downloaded report will contain the full record of the registration for the home and will be automatically saved to your dashboard.
mhrNumberSearch.reviewSearchResultInfo: Review the details of the manufactured home before paying. Your search result will be available in your Searches list.
mhrNumberSearch.folioInfo: Add an optional number for this transaction for your own tracking purposes. This information is not used by the Manufactured Home Registry.
mhrNumberSearch.searchHeader: Manufactured Home and Personal Property Registry Search

mhrNumberValidation.mhrHintMessage: Manufactured home registration numbers normally contain up to 6 digits
mhrNumberValidation.mhrHintWithoutNumber: Enter a manufactured home registration number

mhrNumberNILSearch.noSearchResultInfo: No Registrations were found. A printable PDF search result report and a general record of your search will be saved to your Personal Property Registry dashboard.
mhrNumberNILSearch.noResultsInfo: No registered homes can be found to match the search criteria above.
